p: Finally, we assessed functional changes in forest and grassland communities by fitting yearly community weighted mean (CWM) values of 12 different functional traits (also averaged across the landscape; trait values in Table A in S3 Appendix) to the afore mentioned PCAs, using the function envfit in the vegan R package. This post-hoc approach allowed finding the trait vectors best correlated with axis of the calculated PCAs without constraining the hypervolumes to changes in functional diversity.
